Quality uses the Quality Plan and other tools and systems to:

  • Develop or identify robust test methods.

  • Develop product specifications to define critical performance characteristics based on known variability.

  • Identify product specifications and other data using statistics and experimental design.

  • Confirm manufacturing capability of a product.

  • Determine final product specifications and support Launch and post-Launch activities.

By completing and documenting the process across phases, Quality also contributes to Product and Process Understanding (PPU)—a method of understanding the relationships between customer wants and 3M production to inform future projects and guide internal improvements.

Next, you’ll explore Quality tasks and responsibilities by phase.
